Job Info:
Revcloud · Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan (Hybrid)  
1 week ago

 · 95 applicants
Job Desception:
About the job
            

 
About Revcloud:Revcloud is helping businesses use data to grow and we match you with low cost global teams to push your business to the next level. Imagine if you had all of the potential buyers of your products and services in your database, you knew what they liked to read, how to get them to talk to you, and you could use machine learning and AI to generate leads and grow your revenue. Revcloud is data you need, the playbooks proven to grow your business, and the low cost global teams to do the work.Job Summary:We are looking for an AWS Data Engineer to join our team. As a data engineer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing scalable, reliable, and efficient data pipelines on AWS cloud infrastructure. You should have at least 2+ years of experience working with AWS data technologies.Key Responsibilities: Design and develop data ingestion pipelines using AWS Glue, S3, and other relevant tools.Work with stakeholders to identify data requirements, data sources, and data transformations.Implement data quality checks and data validation procedures.Optimize data pipelines for performance and scalability.Troubleshoot and resolve data pipeline issues.Develop and maintain technical documentation.
Required Skills and Experience: At least 2 years of experience in AWS data engineering.Familiarity with AWS Glue, Athena, and S3.Strong programming skills in Python.Experience with SQL and relational databases.Experience with data modeling, data warehousing, and ETL.Familiarity with AWS Lambda and CloudFormation.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Education and Certifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field.AWS certification, such as AWS Certified Developer - Associate or AWS Cloud Practitioner is a plus.
Working Conditions: This is a hybrid position, you will be required to work from our Lahore office 3 days per week. 3 days/week on-call availability will be required.Working with a team in different time zones may require flexibility with working hours.If you meet the requirements and are passionate about working with data technologies on AWS cloud infrastructure, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity as an AWS Data Engineer.

About our work @ Taleemabad:We began our work seven years ago, with a very simple idea: learning’s gotta be fun. You’ve probably experienced this at some point if you’re lucky: you’ve been so engrossed in something that time’s flown by, the day has turned to night, and you’ve had the time of your life. That’s the kind of learning that generates scientists, inventors, and changemakers.And so, seven years ago, we became obsessed with the idea of making all children in Pakistan fall in love with learning. The Business Development Executive will also need to stay updated on current market conditions, trading trends, and emerging opportunities within the industry. Strong negotiation skills and the ability to successfully close deals are essential to excel in this role.Responsibilities:• Prospect and identify potential new clients, converting leads into increased business opportunities within the petrochemical trading sector.• Expand the current prospect database within specified trading sectors, generating effective leads and exceeding sales targets on a monthly basis.• Develop a comprehensive sales contact plan, utilizing direct marketing strategies and attending industry events to build relationships with key prospects in the trading community.• Formulate and execute business development, marketing, and sales strategies that generate new trading opportunities and facilitate successful trades.• Conduct negotiations with clients, leveraging your expertise in trading dynamics to secure favorable outcomes and successfully close deals.• Assist in business negotiations, ensuring that contractual terms and conditions are favorable for the company.• Develop and oversee overseas subsidiaries, as well as other trading initiatives, ensuring effective cross-border transactions and expanding the company's trading network.• Respond to incoming Requests for Information (RFIs) and Requests for Proposals (RFPs) in a professional and creative manner, showcasing your trading acumen.• Collaborate with technical staff and internal colleagues to meet customer needs effectively, ensuring seamless execution of trading transactions.• Arrange and participate in internal and external client debriefs, analyzing trading outcomes and identifying areas for improvement.• Present to and consult with mid and senior-level management on emerging trading trends, identifying opportunities for new trading services, products, and distribution channels.• Facilitate meetings between client decision-makers and the company's practice leaders, leveraging your expertise to drive successful trading collaborations.• Ensure accurate data entry and management within the company's trading systems, including trade execution platforms and risk management tools.• Provide regular feedback to senior management regarding marketplace dynamics, trading strategies, and competitor activities, enabling informed decision-making.• Meet monthly targets and key performance indicators (KPIs) to drive individual and team success in the highly competitive trading environment.Qualifications:• Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Finance, Economics, or a related field. Flexibility to travel as required to attend trading conferences, and industry events, and meet clients nationally and internationally.• Highly motivated, with a results-oriented mindset and a passion for the intricacies of trading.• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a keen eye for identifying trading opportunities.
